page.title: 16CONCERNS ABOUT LEVEN
page.content: We interviewed 9 mums. I asked if they liked living in Leven 7 people liked it but two people were just visiting the village. I asked have you always lived in the village. One person said yes, 5 people said no, so I asked where they had come from, most had from Hull or its suburbs;two had come from S.Yorkshire. I asked if they thought the village people were friendly, they answered that they were. I wanted to find out if they thought the village was noisy or quiet. Tidy or untidy. The survey found that most thought the village was quiet and tidy.The children in my class think that it is untidy especially near the bus stop and shops,as there are sweet & fish & chip papers & empty packets. blowing around.The children felt that there should be more rubbish bins.
